Let's Get Growing!

1

Planting Your Seeds

  1. Fill your container with potting soil, leaving about an inch of space at the top
  2. Make small holes with your finger (check your seed packet for the right depth)
  3. Place 2-3 seeds in each hole
  4. Cover gently with soil
  5. Label your plant
  6. Water gently until the soil is damp but not soaking wet
2

Daily Plant Care

  • â˜€ï¸ Place your containers in a sunny spot
